description: The initiative focuses on sustainable agriculture through a market garden model, emphasizing organic produce and community engagement. It combines vegetable cultivation with public education, offering field walks and workdays in collaboration with local organizations. The project aims to create a cooperative farming environment, allowing participants to explore alternative farming methods while fostering a sense of community. By prioritizing local connections and education, the initiative seeks to redefine agricultural practices and promote sustainable living.
name: Jordbruget Soldug
